articles.author: Zijia Song
articles.title: ‘Real Housewives’ star sentenced to jail for telemarketing scam - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Prosecutors said the American star targeted “vulnerable, elderly victims” for years and went to extraordinary efforts to conceal her crime.
articles.content:
New York: The housewife was real. The deal wasnt.
Reality TV star Jen Shah has been sentenced to 6½ years in prison for running a nationwide telemarketing fraud scheme in the United States that pros… [+1678 chars]
